scripts.test: nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text ts-node node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --watch-extensions ts algorithms/**/*.test.ts data-structures/**/*.test.ts exercises/**/*.test.ts utils/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:watch: ts-node node_modules/.bin/_mocha --watch-extensions ts --watch -R min algorithms/**/*.test.ts data-structures/**/*.test.ts exercises/**/*.test.ts utils/**/*.test.ts
